main event: A civilian observed a red-glowing object shaped like bananas flying from north to south over Martinsburg, Ohio in 5 minutes.
interesting points: The observation took place on September 20, 1955, in clear weather conditions with few scattered clouds.
The object was described as 'globbing' and red-glowing, resembling the shape of bananas.
There were no photographs of the object included in the report.
The observer reported the object flying out of sight to the south within 5 minutes.
The source of the report was a civilian.
